# desktop [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/desktop.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/desktop)

> Capture a screenshot *(macOS only)*


## Install

```
$ npm install --global desktop
```


## Usage

```
$ desktop
```
